vote.title: Mutiny for features
vote.content: From now on, ye can participate in voting to decide th' direction of th' next feature. Avast ye! Custom Name/Nickname Pool: Yo ho ho. Tired of th' same barnacle covered NPC names? Now ye can create your own name pool. When a new NPC be spawned, a name will be randomly selected from your pool. Ye can even import names from your Discord group. Visual Novel Mode: Engage in pre-set dialogues with NPCs whar different choices will determine th' story's direction. Ye can freely create and share these stories. Shiver me timbers! Come and mutiny to contribute your ideas for th' future development of this mod!

opensource.title: Add Your Own Content to th' Mod
opensource.content: Whether it's fixing localization issues or developing new features, your contributions will make th' mod even better. Sling yer hook! Visit th' mod's GitHub repository and submit your first Pull Request!

localization.title: Localization Content Adjustment
localization.content: I've been focusing on fixing code errors and simplifying th' code structure. At th' same time, I'm adding more NPC dialogues to th' mod, aiming to give each camp personalized dialogues that match their character backgrounds. Thar she blows! I'm also testing and optimizing localization content, hoping to provide players in different languages with more authentic and natural text expressions. If ye have better suggestions for certain dialogues or texts or be willing to help improve localization content, feel free to share with me anytime!

earlyaccess.title: Sponsor Early Access
earlyaccess.content: Th' NPC Dialogue Mod be now open for sponsor-exclusive testing! After a long development period, th' official version of th' NPC Dialogue Mod be about to be released, and th' latest voice service feature has been completed. Some features of th' mod be not yet implemented, including th' camp system, skill system, deck system, and trading system. Therefore, NPCs from different camps will not be hostile to each other or change relationships, and playing cards during negotiations will not have any effect. These be not th' features I've been working on recently. When will they be implemented? Maybe in th' next major update, or maybe they'll be cut. Additionally, before th' official release, I will focus on fixing existing bugs and completing localization work, and will not add new features for now. Everyone be welcome to actively participate in testing, experience th' mod in single-player or multiplayer modes, and report any issues encountered to help me continuously optimize th' gaming experience. Becoming a sponsor or publishing mod reviews or recommendation videos on self-media platforms can earn ye badges, and new badges will be added to th' mod in th' next update. Th' mod be currently only available for sponsor testing before official release and be prohibited from being shared. Avast ye! Thank ye for your support, and grog-filled hunting!
